title: AMERICAN GODS Season 2 Episode 1 Breakdown & Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: Old Gods or New? Comment with your allegiance below!
I love when Bilquis told Oden “I was old in the desert before they sacrificed the first horse to you.”
Mr Nanci's spider eyes on his forehead and his dreadlocks moving like spider legs were AWESOME character design!!! Praise the Old Gods!!

The cinematography in the house on the rock scenes was amazing, every single shot from the time they arrived to the time they ended up in the diner was beautifully done. The special effects "inside Odin's mind" was better then some big budget films I have seen recently. I can't wait for the rest of the season.
The effects in the scene where all the Gods were in their natural forms was....legit, specially for a TV show, dare I say that I got Game of Thrones vibes...
description:
We breakdown season 2 episode 1 of American Gods "House on the Rock" and explore its mythology and hidden details!
